throws.description: There are too many bots in this chat/channel
throws.name: BOTS_TOO_MUCH

throws.description: This bot can't be added to groups
throws.name: BOT_GROUPS_BLOCKED

throws.description: You must be an admin in this chat to do this
throws.name: CHAT_ADMIN_REQUIRED

throws.description: You can't write in this chat
throws.name: CHAT_WRITE_FORBIDDEN

throws.description: The maximum number of users has been exceeded (to create a chat, for example)
throws.name: USERS_TOO_MUCH

throws.description: You're banned from sending messages in supergroups/channels
throws.name: USER_BANNED_IN_CHANNEL

throws.description: Bots can only be admins in channels.
throws.name: USER_BOT

throws.description: One of the users you tried to add is already in too many channels/supergroups
throws.name: USER_CHANNELS_TOO_MUCH

throws.description: The provided user ID is invalid
throws.name: USER_ID_INVALID

throws.description: This user was kicked from this supergroup/channel
throws.name: USER_KICKED

throws.description: The provided user is not a mutual contact
throws.name: USER_NOT_MUTUAL_CONTACT

throws.description: The user's privacy settings do not allow you to do this
throws.name: USER_PRIVACY_RESTRICTED
